step.comment: Click the 'SW Subscription and Support entitlement' option from the navigation panel.

step.extension: SW Subscription and Support entitlements Search form

steps.step: settext loginPage:logon_text $web:username. settext loginPage:logon_password $web:password. Click loginPage:submit_button.

step.comment: Input 'Customer name' field with 'nntp' and click 'Search'.(Have all program types checked.)
step.extension: SW Subscription and Support entitlements with no customer site entitlement information

steps.step: settext softwareSubscriptionSearchPage:customerName_text $web:customerName5. check softwareSubscriptionSearchPage:pa_checkbox true. check softwareSubscriptionSearchPage:pae_checkbox true. check softwareSubscriptionSearchPage:fct_checkbox true. Click softwareSubscriptionSearchPage:search_button.

step.extension: SW Subscription and Support entitlements Search form

step.comment: Input 'IBM Customer number' field with '256756' and click 'Search'.(Have all program types checked.)
step.extension: SW Subscription and Support entitlements with no customer site entitlement information

steps.step: settext softwareSubscriptionSearchPage:customerNum_text $web:customerNum3. check softwareSubscriptionSearchPage:pa_checkbox true. check softwareSubscriptionSearchPage:pae_checkbox true. check softwareSubscriptionSearchPage:fct_checkbox true. Click softwareSubscriptionSearchPage:search_button.

step.extension: SW Subscription and Support entitlements Search form

step.comment: Input 'Postal code' field with '24536' and click 'Search'.(Have all program types checked.)
step.extension: SW Subscription and Support entitlements with no customer site entitlement information

steps.step: settext softwareSubscriptionSearchPage:postalCode_text $web:postalCode4. check softwareSubscriptionSearchPage:pa_checkbox true. check softwareSubscriptionSearchPage:pae_checkbox true. check softwareSubscriptionSearchPage:fct_checkbox true. Click softwareSubscriptionSearchPage:search_button.

step.extension: SW Subscription and Support entitlements Search form

step.comment: Input 'Agreement number' field with '446478' and click 'Search'.(Have all program types checked.)
step.extension: SW Subscription and Support entitlements with no customer site entitlement information

steps.step: settext softwareSubscriptionSearchPage:agreementNum_text $web:agreementNum3. check softwareSubscriptionSearchPage:pa_checkbox true. check softwareSubscriptionSearchPage:pae_checkbox true. check softwareSubscriptionSearchPage:fct_checkbox true. Click softwareSubscriptionSearchPage:search_button.

step.extension: SW Subscription and Support entitlements Search form

step.comment: Input 'Site number' field with '7254326' value and click 'Search'.(Have all program types checked.)
step.extension: SW Subscription and Support entitlements with no customer site entitlement information

steps.step: settext softwareSubscriptionSearchPage:siteNumber_text $web:siteNumber2. check softwareSubscriptionSearchPage:pa_checkbox true. check softwareSubscriptionSearchPage:pae_checkbox true. check softwareSubscriptionSearchPage:fct_checkbox true. Click softwareSubscriptionSearchPage:search_button.

step.extension: SW Subscription and Support entitlements Search form
